verbs.description: [ARGM-MNR: slow] - [V: cooked] spicy goulash ground cumin chili powder and a can of mexican diced tomatoes jazz up my goulash recipe even the elbow macaroni is prepared in the slow cooker —melissa polk west lafayette indiana
